heroSection.title: Learn Uyghur Language & Culture
heroSection.subtitle: Discover the beauty of Uyghur language through interactive courses, cultural materials, and a supportive community.

news.title: Welcome to UyghurLearn Community!
news.author: UyghurLearn Team
news.description: Welcome to our learning community! This is a place where we can share our experiences, ask questions, and support each other in learning the Uyghur language and culture. Feel free to introduce yourself and share your learning goals!

learnPage.deleteConfirmContent: Are you sure you want to delete the course "{{courseName}}"? This action is irreversible.

communityUsers.defaultDescription: Share your learning goals and experience!

communityPage.title: Community
communityPage.subtitle: Connect with fellow learners, share experiences, and grow together.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: Learn more about our mission, vision, and the team behind this platform.
aboutUs.missionText: To provide accessible and high-quality education for everyone, everywhere.
aboutUs.visionText: To create a global community of learners who are empowered to achieve their full potential.

section1.title: General Information
section1.content: The YughurLearn platform is designed for learning the Uyghur language. The platform can only be used by persons over 12 years of age. The platform has no legal status and operates as a private educational project.

section2.title: What Data We Collect
section2.intro: We collect and store the following user data:
section2.item8: Activity status, registration date and last login
section2.item10: Role in the system (e.g., student, teacher, admin)

section3.title: Purpose of Data Collection
section3.intro: Data is used exclusively within the service:
section3.item4: For internal analytics and tracking progress

section4.title: Sharing Data with Third Parties
section4.content: We do not share data with third parties. All information is used only within the YughurLearn platform.

section5.title: Where Data is Stored
section5.content: Data is stored in MongoDB on protected servers with restricted access.

section6.title: User Rights
section6.content: Users have the right to request deletion of their personal data by contacting the manager via Telegram or WhatsApp. After deletion, access to the platform will be closed.

section7.title: Learning, Payment, and Refunds
section7.paragraph1: The platform provides access to courses that may be paid. Costs and payment methods are specified through the manager.
section7.paragraph2: Payment data is not collected through the website and is not processed directly.
section7.paragraph3: Refunds, compensation, or other reimbursement are not possible under any circumstances. Instead:
section7.item1: Users can use paid sessions until the end of their subscription;
section7.item2: Or transfer them to another user (with manager approval).

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Unlock full access to all courses and features with the plan that suits you best.
pricing.whatsappMessage: Hello! I would like to inquire about the price for the {{plan}} course. Thank you!

beginner.title: Beginner
beginner.description: Course designed for those who do not speak Uyghur at all; children and adults who want to start from scratch; people born in diaspora who want to reconnect with their ancestors' language.

intermediate.title: Intermediate
intermediate.description: The course is suitable for those who already have basic knowledge and want to confidently use Uyghur in everyday speech. We deepen vocabulary, practice grammar, learn to express complex thoughts and understand native speakers.

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.description: For those who speak Uyghur fluently but want to take the language to a high level. We analyze nuances, idioms, literary speech and professional contexts. Improve fluency, style and confidence.

speaking.title: Speaking
speaking.description: Course with a focus on conversation practice. Maximum conversation, minimum theory â€” living Uyghur language in dialogues, discussions, and role-playing. Suitable for all levels who want to speak freely and without embarrassment.
